coreAttributes.name: mince pie
coreAttributes.description: A sweet pie, filled with a mixture of dried fruits and spices. Curiously, the pie seems to remain permanently warm to the touch, revealing that an enchantment of some sort must have been placed on it.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/10)]

A warm wave of arcane energy washes over [npc.name]...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_DAMAGE_LUST, 1)] [#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_DAMAGE_FIRE, 1)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(bring)] the enchanted mince pie up to [npc.her] mouth, before taking an experimental bite. The warm, spiced fruit filling is absolutely delicious, leading [npc.herHim] to greedily wolf down the entire pie.
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(bring)] the enchanted mince pie up to [npc2.namePos] mouth, before encouraging [npc2.herHim] to take an experimental bite. The warm, spiced fruit filling turns out to be absolutely delicious, leading [npc2.name] to eagerly wolf down the entire pie.
